name: INBalanceAmount
desc: A balance associated with an account.

items.name: init(amount: NSDecimalNumber, currencyCode: String)
items.desc: Initializes a balance amount with a monetary amount.

items.name: init?(amount: NSDecimalNumber, balanceType: INBalanceType)
items.desc: Initializes a balance amount object with a customizable type of information.

items.name: var amount: NSDecimalNumber?
items.desc: The numerical amount associated with the balance.

items.name: var currencyCode: String?
items.desc: The ISO 4217 currency code that applies to a monetary amount.

items.name: var balanceType: INBalanceType
items.desc: The type associated with the balance.

items.name: enum INBalanceType
items.desc: Constants indicating the meaning of a balance.
